name.zh_cn: 某胡子学生会长的寒假

desc.en: Cherino has rented out an entire hot springs resort for her winter vacation, but unable to deal with her boredom, she challenges Sensei to a game of table tennis.
desc.jp: Cherino has rented out an entire hot springs resort for her winter vacation, but unable to deal with her boredom, she challenges Sensei to a game of table tennis.
desc.zh_cn: 为了尽情享受悠闲的寒假时光，{cf洁莉诺}特地租下了整座温泉浴场。抵抗不了休假的无聊，{cf洁莉诺}向老师提议来进行一场桌球比赛。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino decides to oil her mustache to prevent it from getting wet as she bathes in the hot spring. However, the toasted sesame seed oil she uses has such a strong scent that she is forced to go without her mustache for a while.
desc.jp: Cherino decides to oil her mustache to prevent it from getting wet as she bathes in the hot spring. However, the toasted sesame seed oil she uses has such a strong scent that she is forced to go without her mustache for a while.
desc.zh_cn: 为了避免自己的胡子在泡温泉时弄湿，{cf洁莉诺}特地在胡子上抹了一点油，只不过由于她使用的是味道浓烈的芝麻油，因此她后来有好一阵子都只能过着没有胡子的生活。

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.jp: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.zh_cn: 为了安慰失去胡子的{cf洁莉诺}，老师便特地买了一瓶水果牛奶给她。由于喝完牛奶后，嘴边会多一圈看起来很像胡子的白色牛奶渍，因此{cf洁莉诺}便从此爱上了牛奶。不幸的是，因为{cf洁莉诺}一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她后来便开始疯狂拉肚子。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sensei visits a nearby Gehenna hot springs resort and runs into Chinatsu, who happens to be on vacation. However, Chinatsu is unable to unwind and put down her work, so Sensei helps with the paperwork.
desc.jp: Sensei visits a nearby Gehenna hot springs resort and runs into Chinatsu, who happens to be on vacation. However, Chinatsu is unable to unwind and put down her work, so Sensei helps with the paperwork.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在{sn格黑娜}学园附近的温泉浴场中巧遇了正在度假的{cf千夏}。但即使在度假期间，{cf千夏}也放不下手边的工作……为了{cf千夏}，老师决定陪她一起处理文书作业。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Chinatsu visits the resort's souvenir shop to buy thank-you gifts for the Prefect Team. After picking out their gifts, Sensei gives Chinatsu a ribbon to thank her for looking after them.
desc.jp: Chinatsu visits the resort's souvenir shop to buy thank-you gifts for the Prefect Team. After picking out their gifts, Sensei gives Chinatsu a ribbon to thank her for looking after them.
desc.zh_cn: 为了帮{cn风纪委员会}的成员们买礼物，{cf千夏}来到了温泉浴场内的纪念品店。{cf千夏}挑选完礼物后，老师也买了个蝴蝶结饰品送给{cf千夏}，感谢她平时对自己的照料。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Chinatsu gifts Sensei a voucher to stay at an upscale ryokan, but the voucher is to stay at a family facility instead of an individual one by mistake. Sensei and Chinatsu enjoy the baths together and have a great time.
desc.jp: Chinatsu gifts Sensei a voucher to stay at an upscale ryokan, but the voucher is to stay at a family facility instead of an individual one by mistake. Sensei and Chinatsu enjoy the baths together and have a great time.
desc.zh_cn: 为了报答老师，{cf千夏}把一张高级旅馆住宿券送给老师。虽然由于{cf千夏}的失误，老师没能泡到单人温泉，但老师和{cf千夏}后来还是一起在家庭汤屋中度过了美好的时光。

desc.en: Chise tries to keep her distance from Sensei, afraid that misfortune will come because of a chain letter she found on the beach. Sensei spends three days with Chise to prove that the contents of the letter are lies.
desc.jp: Chise tries to keep her distance from Sensei, afraid that misfortune will come because of a chain letter she found on the beach. Sensei spends three days with Chise to prove that the contents of the letter are lies.
desc.zh_cn: {cf知世}害怕因为在海边捡到的「幸运信」会带来不幸，便和老师拉开了距离，但老师为了证明信中的内容都是骗人了，便和{cf知世}一起度过了3天。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: What I Want to Show You
name.jp: What I Want to Show You

name.en: Hot Springs Training: Rest and Relaxation
name.jp: Hot Springs Training: Rest and Relaxation

desc.en: Sensei reserves a foot bath with great therapeutic effects for Nodoka and her sprained ankle. Nodoka and Sensei have a great time together while enjoying the foot bath.
desc.jp: Sensei reserves a foot bath with great therapeutic effects for Nodoka and her sprained ankle. Nodoka and Sensei have a great time together while enjoying the foot bath.
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf和香}的脚伤能够尽快痊愈，老师替她预约了一间据说能缓和疼痛的足浴汤屋。{cf和香}和老师两人一边泡着足浴，一边度过了一段美好的时光。

desc.en: While visiting a public bathhouse with Sensei, Shigure is asked by the bathhouse owner for the recipe for her special fruit milk. Shigure asks for a favor in return for the recipe.
desc.jp: While visiting a public bathhouse with Sensei, Shigure is asked by the bathhouse owner for the recipe for her special fruit milk. Shigure asks for a favor in return for the recipe.
desc.zh_cn: {cf时雨}和老师一起拜访大众浴池，浴场老板拜托{cf时雨}告诉自己特制水果奶的食谱。{cf时雨}把食谱告诉老板，但也提出了一个请求。

desc.en: Shigure gets a job as milk bartender for a day at the bathhouse. Sensei watches Shigure at work and ends up missing the last train home. With nowhere else to stay, Sensei ends up sleeping in the employee quarters at Shigure's invitation.
desc.jp: Shigure gets a job as milk bartender for a day at the bathhouse. Sensei watches Shigure at work and ends up missing the last train home. With nowhere else to stay, Sensei ends up sleeping in the employee quarters at Shigure's invitation.
desc.zh_cn: {cf时雨}在浴场担任一日调奶师。老师为了照顾{cf时雨}错过末班车却找不到留宿的地方，{cf时雨}将员工宿舍的一侧让给老师。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei and Nodoka head to the entrance of the hot springs resort to find the Labor Party students staging a protest. The Labor Party is unhappy the resort was built by the Hot Springs Department and wants it demolished. Nodoka resists, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: Sensei and Nodoka head to the entrance of the hot springs resort to find the Labor Party students staging a protest. The Labor Party is unhappy the resort was built by the Hot Springs Department and wants it demolished. Nodoka resists, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_cn: 受到吵闹声的吸引，前往温泉浴场入口的老师与{cf和香}，遇上了正在示威抗议的工务部学生。工务部学将{cn温泉开发部}建造的227号温泉浴场视为眼中钉要进行拆除，为了阻止工务部，{cf和香}和她们展开了战斗。

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

desc.en: Sensei runs into Chinatsu relaxing in a massage chair in the lounge. Chinatsu warns Sensei about the Hot Springs Department's conspiracy.
desc.jp: Sensei runs into Chinatsu relaxing in a massage chair in the lounge. Chinatsu warns Sensei about the Hot Springs Department's conspiracy.
desc.zh_cn: 老师偶然在休息室里碰见坐在按摩椅上享受按摩的{cf千夏}。{cf千夏}向老师透露{cn温泉开发部}的阴谋，并提醒老师要多加留意。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: The Fourth Obstacle: The Trick House 1
name.jp: The Fourth Obstacle: The Trick House 1

desc.en: The last trial in the way of the Ninjutsu Research Club is the Trick House, where Kaede is the gatekeeper. When everyone is united to face the trial, Michiru, who acts hastily out of urgency, gets caught in the Trick House's trap along with Sensei.
desc.jp: The last trial in the way of the Ninjutsu Research Club is the Trick House, where Kaede is the gatekeeper. When everyone is united to face the trial, Michiru, who acts hastily out of urgency, gets caught in the Trick House's trap along with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 最后阻挡着{cn忍术研究部}的，是由{cf枫}担任守门人的机关屋试炼。正当大家要齐心协力面对试炼的时候。被着急的心牵引的{cf三千留}和老师一起被卷入机关屋的陷阱。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

hobby.en: 自家製ドリンクを作ること
hobby.jp: 自家製ドリンクを作ること
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 自家制ドリンクを作ること

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

hobby.en: Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
